name: DarkBIT - dark theme for BitMarket
description: When you're trading in the dark, your eyes are accustomed to it, so opening bright sites makes you blind. This little style helps your eyes be healthy while visiting bitmarket.pl and bitmarket.net
additional_info:
Changelog:
* 1.3 - 25/10/17 - fixed buttons, cleanup code
* 1.2 - 25/08/17  - fixed dropdown entries, darked one bar on the top of site
* 1.1 - 01/07/17 - darked dropdown menu
* 1.0 - 21/06/17 - initial release
